New Records: Axar Patel scored the fastest 65 off 31 balls in the match
Key Match Events: Axar Patel and Suryakumar Yadav's 91-run sixth-wicket partnership went in vain
Dasun Shanaka produced an all-round show, first smashing unbeaten 56 off 22 balls and then defending 21 in the final over
Sri Lanka skipper Shanaka muscled the bowler over his head for a one bounce four
Post-Match Reflections: Hardik Pandya said that no-ball in any format is a crime
Arshdeep Singh created an unwanted record, bowling a hat-trick of no-balls in T20Is
Miscellaneous Highlights: India had a nightmarish start to their chase slumping to 57 for 5 before Axar and Surya raised hopes of an improbable win with a scintillating sixth-wicket stand
Debutant Rahul Tripathi sneaked one to Kusal Mendis off Dilshan Madhushanaka in the next over
